message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. This is a high-quality item worth more than $100, and I believe it will be a valuable addition to your collection.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested in the product, but $110 feels a bit steep for me. Would you consider lowering the price to $100?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. Considering your feedback, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $105 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting its value.
